title: Never got icon for xayah and rakan event
body: Just realized I never got the blazing feathers icon for the xayah rakan event even though i played more than two games w/ xayah and rakan during the time period.

replies.body: No worries! I've double checked for those games and it looks like you did qualify. Check for that icon now ^_^!
